response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe is an excellent match for your needs and expectations. This product holds significant value for you, estimated at $12,000. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000, hoping to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this offer meets your considerations, and we can proceed with the details. Thank you for your time and interest.", "product_price": 11000}
